positive_test_cases.title: Successful login with valid user id and password
positive_test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to the dashboard

positive_test_cases.title: Login with remember me option checked
positive_test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to the dashboard and remembered on next visit

positive_test_cases.title: Successful login after password reset
steps: Enter new valid password after reset
positive_test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to the dashboard

positive_test_cases.title: Successful login with user id containing special characters
steps: Enter valid user id with special characters
positive_test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to the dashboard

positive_test_cases.title: Successful login with user id and password in different cases
steps: Enter valid user id in different case
Enter valid password in different case
positive_test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to the dashboard

negative_test_cases.title: Login with invalid user id
negative_test_cases.expected_result: Error message displayed: 'Invalid user id or password'

negative_test_cases.title: Login with invalid password
negative_test_cases.expected_result: Error message displayed: 'Invalid user id or password'

negative_test_cases.title: Login with empty user id
negative_test_cases.expected_result: Error message displayed: 'User id cannot be empty'

negative_test_cases.title: Login with empty password
negative_test_cases.expected_result: Error message displayed: 'Password cannot be empty'

negative_test_cases.title: Login attempt after account lockout
negative_test_cases.expected_result: Error message displayed: 'Account locked due to multiple failed attempts'

edge_cases.title: Login with user id containing spaces
steps: Enter user id with leading and trailing spaces
edge_cases.expected_result: Error message displayed: 'Invalid user id or password'

edge_cases.title: Login with SQL injection in user id
steps: Enter user id with SQL injection
edge_cases.expected_result: Error message displayed: 'Invalid user id or password'

edge_cases.title: Login with very long user id
steps: Enter user id exceeding character limit
edge_cases.expected_result: Error message displayed: 'User id is too long'

edge_cases.title: Login with very long password
edge_cases.expected_result: Error message displayed: 'Password is too long'

edge_cases.title: Login with special characters in password
edge_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to the dashboard

feature: Login with user id and password
